channel.title: How to change webclients background!
channel.description: Okay so ive tried editing the sprites folder to change it and also re compling the whole thing and reuploading but nothing will work what do i do????

item.title: How to change webclients background!
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

is it a custom background or the original runescape background and is it cache packed if cache packed use toms cache suite if it just sitting there in the sprites folder right cliek edit cahnge it and save and restart client but ur gonna have to jar your client (make a new webclient.jar file)

Read full topic

item.title: How to change webclients background!
item.dc:creator: @yodudes yodudes
item.description:
@yodudes wrote:

Edit your sprites, put them in your cache folder, or wherever you’d normally put it. Re-zip. Re upload them to your host, and then you can play again. Be sure to update your website code to make sure it’s downloading the cache from the new host URL.

If this doesn’t work, sorry, but I’m almost certain it will.

Read full topic
